parameters.description: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.
parameters.label: Error Handling

parameters.description: The email address of the simulated sender.
parameters.label: From (Email Address)

parameters.description: The email address of the intended recipient.
parameters.label: To (Email Address)

parameters.description: The email address of the intended recipient.
parameters.label: Bcc (Email Address)

parameters.description: HTML representing the body of a rich email.
parameters.label: HTML Body
parameters.value:
Hi <%= @user['Display Name'] %>,

We're excited to get you up to speed on the Kinetic Platform. Here's a link to your environment for use during the training.

End User Portal: <%= @space_attributes['Web Server Url'] %>
Admin Portal: <%= @space_attributes['Web Server Url'] %>/app

Your username is: <%= @user['Email'] %>
Your password is: <%= @user['Email'] %>2023

We'll keep this environment around for 2 weeks after the training event. If you'd like to have it for longer, just let us know!

Happy Learning!

Kinetic Data

parameters.description: A plaintext message that will be displayed if the recipient can't display multipart HTML emails.
parameters.label: Alternate (text) Body
